entry.title: Russia's Shifting War Plan Threatens More Suffering for Eastern Ukraine
entry.content: Moscow’s decision to change its Ukraine assault strategy underscores how the Kremlin is trying to secure territory that it has coveted for years.

entry.title: How Kyiv's Hospital #8 Became the War's Front Line for Wounded Ukrainians
entry.content: The Kyiv hospital was a center of excellence for scheduled surgeries on problems like hernias and heart valves. Then Russia’s invasion swept up to the edge of the Ukrainian capital, turning the hospital into a front-line medical facility.

entry.title: Taliban Rules Impose Chaperones on Afghan Women
entry.content: Women in Afghanistan must now be accompanied by a male relative to complete many basic tasks, among a series of new measures they say threaten to squeeze them out of public and professional life.
